Package model

Class Card

java.lang.Object
model.Card
public class Card extends Object
Class representing a playing card. Each card has a suit, rank, and a value.

      public String suit

    • rank

  • Constructor Details

    • Card

      public Card(String suit, String rank, int value)
      Constructs a card with specified suit, rank, and value.
      Parameters:
      suit - The suit of the card (e.g., "Hearts", "Diamonds", etc.).
      rank - The rank of the card (e.g., "Ace", "King", "Queen", etc.).
      value - The numerical value of the card in the game (e.g., 2-10, or special values for face cards).

  • Method Details

    • getSuit

      public String getSuit()
      Retrieves the suit of the card.
      Returns:
      The suit of the card.

    • getRank

      public String getRank()
      Retrieves the rank of the card.
      Returns:
      The rank of the card.

    • getValue

      public int getValue()
      Retrieves the numerical value of the card.
      Returns:
      The value of the card.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the card. The format is "rank-suit" (e.g., "Ace-Hearts").
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      The string representation of the card.

    • getValueOfAce

      public int getValueOfAce()
      Retrieves the value of an Ace card in the game. Aces can have a value of either 1 or 11, depending on other cards in play.
      Returns:
      The value of the Ace card (either 1 or 11).

    • isAce

      public boolean isAce()
      Checks if the card is an Ace.
      Returns:
      true if the card is an Ace, false otherwise.

    • getImagePath

      public String getImagePath()
      Retrieves the file path of the image representing the card. The image file path is assumed to be under "cards/" directory and named "rank-suit.png".
      Returns:
      The file path of the card image.
